meaningMnemonic: <radical>Women</radical> who get together to talk about <radical>grain</radical>s are a <kanji>committee</kanji>. They're the Committee of Women for Grains (tm tm tm). What does this committee discuss, you wonder.
readingMnemonic: Well, grains need a <kanji>committee</kanji> because the <reading>ea</reading>gles (い) have been eating them all. The women know this, so they're meeting and trying to come up with a way to stop these pesky eagles from eating all the grains and leaving none for the humans.
